本地图处于公开测试阶段,可能存在部分BUG,欢迎前往steam创意工坊留言反馈.Translation: This map is in open testing phase, there may be some bugs. Please leave feedback on the Steam Workshop.

地图作者:黑岩,Fong感谢tenshi.,mdxzl,lemon,tianli.Translation: Map author: Heiyan. Thanks to tenshi, mdxzl, lemon, tianli, and Qi Liu for their help in map creation and porting. Porter: lopb. This map requires cs2fixes and lua unlocker to play properly. EN Translation: Allenw @ Ozlin server

拉法库巴封印了石碑的魔力,我们必须找到他!.Translation: Rafakuba has sealed the magic of the stone tablet; we must find him!

传送25秒后将被打开.Translation: The teleportation will open in 25 seconds.

一名玩家拾取了【寒风】.Translation: A player has picked up [Cold Wind].

晶体被破坏，周围的空气变得异常.Translation: The crystal is destroyed, and the surrounding air becomes unusual.

净化水晶已经解封.Translation: The Purification Crystal has been unsealed.

有一名玩家化身成为了【精灵法师】.Translation: A player has transformed into a [Spirit Mage].

一名玩家拾取了【治疗法杖】.Translation: A player has picked up [Healing Staff].

斯狄科雪域大门将在60秒后打开.Translation: The gate to the Sidico Snowfield will open in 60 seconds.

一名玩家拾取了【冰垒】.Translation: A player has picked up [Ice Barrier].

斯狄科雪域大门将在10秒后打开.Translation: The gate to the Sidico Snowfield will open in 10 seconds.

攻击岩石的脆弱部分!.Translation: Attack the weak part of the rock!

也许冰磊可以帮助我们.Translation: Maybe Ice Boulder can help us.

斯狄科雪域大门将在5秒后关闭.Translation: The gate to the Sidico Snowfield will close in 5 seconds.

20秒后打开石门.Translation: The stone door will open in 20 seconds.

等待5秒封锁解除.Translation: Wait 5 seconds for the blockade to be lifted.

封锁已解除，我们继续前进!.Translation: The blockade has been lifted, let's move forward!

一名玩家拾取了【圣盾】.Translation: A player has picked up [Holy Shield].

20秒后升起石柱.Translation: The stone pillar will rise in 20 seconds.

大门将在40秒后打开.Translation: The gate will open in 40 seconds.

右侧拉杆已拉动.Translation: The right lever has been pulled.

左侧拉杆已拉动.Translation: The left lever has been pulled.

大门将在50秒后被摧毁.Translation: The gate will be destroyed in 50 seconds.

大门将在10秒后打开.Translation: The gate will open in 10 seconds.

炸弹将在20秒后爆炸.Translation: The bomb will explode in 20 seconds.

5秒后右侧门开放.Translation: The right door will open in 5 seconds.

5秒后左侧门开放.Translation: The left door will open in 5 seconds.

大门将在30秒后被摧毁.Translation: The gate will be destroyed in 30 seconds.

大门将在30秒后打开.Translation: The gate will open in 30 seconds.

大门将在10秒后被摧毁.Translation: The gate will be destroyed in 10 seconds.

传送将在20秒后打开.Translation: The teleport will open in 20 seconds.

大门将在5秒后被摧毁.Translation: The gate will be destroyed in 5 seconds.

晶体被破坏,周围的空气变得猛烈.Translation: The crystal is destroyed, and the surrounding air becomes intense.

大门将在5秒后打开.Translation: The gate will open in 5 seconds.

传送将在5秒后打开.Translation: The teleport will open in 5 seconds.

40秒后炸毁岩石.Translation: Rocks will be destroyed in 40 seconds.

瞭望塔的玻璃以及悬崖的石头7秒后碎开.Translation: The glass of the lookout tower and the rocks of the cliff will shatter in 7 seconds.

瞭望塔玻璃以及悬崖的石头碎开!.Translation: The glass of the lookout tower and the rocks of the cliff have shattered!

这将是最后一次警告!.Translation: This will be the last warning!

45秒后进入埃洛斯宫殿.Translation: Enter the Elos Palace in 45 seconds.

5秒后炸毁岩石.Translation: Rocks will be destroyed in 5 seconds.

5秒后进入埃洛斯宫殿.Translation: Enter the Elos Palace in 5 seconds.

5秒后捷径路开放.Translation: The shortcut will open in 5 seconds.

35秒后门打开.Translation: The door will open in 35 seconds.

5秒后门打开.Translation: The door will open in 5 seconds.

发生了意料之外的事情，水开始上涨了！.Translation: Something unexpected happened, the water is starting to rise!

25秒后门打开.Translation: The door will open in 25 seconds.

40秒后门打开.Translation: The door will open in 40 seconds.

20秒后门打开.Translation: The door will open in 20 seconds.

50秒后门打开.Translation: The door will open in 50 seconds.

门将在20秒后打开.Translation: The door will open in 20 seconds.

也许还需要防守最多10秒 :3.Translation: We may need to defend for up to 10 more seconds :3

15秒后门打开.Translation: The door will open in 15 seconds.

传送20秒后打开.Translation: The teleport will open in 20 seconds.
